result.reason: Per-folder password protection is a large architectural feature requiring new encryption layer, access control model, and UI changes across the connection tree — well beyond the project's current scope and not planned for any active release.
result.approach: Would require adding password field to ContainerInfo, intercepting tree expand events to prompt for auth, and integrating with existing master password system — defer as out-of-scope enhancement
